title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
**Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop - Space Gray**

**Overview**

Experience unparalleled performance and versatility with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop, designed for creative professionals and tech enthusiasts alike. This powerful machine is equipped with a range of innovative features, ensuring seamless productivity and stunning visuals.

**Key Features**

* **Powerful Processor Options**: Choose from two high-performance chip options - M2 Pro or M2 Max - each delivering exceptional CPU and GPU capabilities. The M2 Pro chip boasts 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and up to 32GB of unified memory, while the M2 Max chip offers 12 CPU cores, up to 38 GPU cores, and up to 96GB of unified memory.
* **Long-Lasting Battery Life**: Enjoy up to 22 hours of battery life, making it perfect for on-the-go use.
* **Stunning Display**: The 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display features Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR content, and pro reference modes, delivering an immersive visual experience.
* **Advanced Camera and Audio**: Capture stunning images with the 1080p FaceTime HD camera and enjoy crystal-clear audio with the three-mic array and six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio.
* **Seamless Connectivity**: Stay connected with MagSafe charging, Thunderbolt 4 ports, SDXC card slot, HDMI port, headphone jack, Wi-Fi 6E, and Bluetooth 5.3.
* **Magic Keyboard**: Type with precision on the full-height function key row and enjoy convenient Touch ID functionality.
* **Universal Compatibility**: Seamlessly integrate with Apple devices, including iPhone and iPad, and access a range of popular apps, including Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, Microsoft 365, and more.
* **Durable Build**: Constructed from an all-aluminum unibody enclosure, this laptop is built to last.
* **Free Software Updates**: Enjoy years of free software updates, ensuring your laptop stays secure and feature-rich.

**Technical Specifications**

* **Color**: Space Gray
* **Memory**: 16GB unified memory
* **Storage**: 512GB SSD
* **Battery Life**: Up to 22 hours
* **Dimensions**: 13.8 x 9.6 x 0.6 inches (35.1 x 24.4 x 1.5 cm)
* **Weight**: 4.3 pounds (1.96 kg)

**Order Now**

Experience the ultimate in performance, style, and innovation with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop. Order now and discover a new world of creativity and productivity.

**Warranty**

This product comes with a 1-year limited warranty and 90-day complimentary technical support.

**Return Policy**

Returns accepted within 30 days of purchase. Please see our return policy for details.
